tidbits.title: Oldest Republic
tidbits.description: San Marino is one of the world's oldest republics, founded in 301 AD, and is considered the oldest sovereign state still in existence.

tidbits.title: Mount Titano
tidbits.description: The country is known for Mount Titano, with its three peaks and the historic city of San Marino atop one of them, offering breathtaking views.

tidbits.title: Microstate Charms
tidbits.description: As one of the world's smallest countries, San Marino charms visitors with its medieval architecture, rich history, and picturesque landscapes.
